channel.title: CVE Feed for PluginOps -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PluginOps -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-48325|2023-12-07T11:32:44.143Z -- pluginops -- landing%20page%20builder%20%E2%80%93%20lead%20page%20%E2%80%93%20optin%20page%20%E2%80%93%20squeeze%20page%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20landing%20pages
item.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in PluginOps Landing Page Builder – Lead Page – Optin Page – Squeeze Page – WordPress Landing Pages.This issue affects Landing Page Builder – Lead Page – Optin Page – Squeeze Page – WordPress Landing Pages: from n/a through 1.5.1.5.

item.title: CVE-2023-32517|2023-12-29T10:05:16.661Z -- pluginops -- mailchimp%20subscribe%20form%2C%20optin%20builder%2C%20popup%20builder%2C%20form%20builder
item.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in PluginOps MailChimp Subscribe Form, Optin Builder, PopUp Builder, Form Builder.This issue affects MailChimp Subscribe Form, Optin Builder, PopUp Builder, Form Builder: from n/a through 4.0.9.3.

item.title: CVE-2023-33328|2023-05-28T17:47:13.125Z -- pluginops -- mailchimp%20subscribe%20form
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in PluginOps MailChimp Subscribe Form plugin <= 4.0.9.1 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-40675|2023-09-27T07:22:00.549Z -- pluginops -- landing%20page%20builder
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in PluginOps Landing Page Builder plugin <= 1.5.1.2 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-34752|2024-06-04T17:42:43.098Z -- pluginops -- landing%20page%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PluginOps Landing Page Builder allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Landing Page Builder: from n/a through 1.5.1.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-30452|2024-03-29T16:40:07.647Z -- pluginops -- landing%20page%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PluginOps Landing Page Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Landing Page Builder: from n/a through 1.5.1.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-31923|2024-04-15T09:25:05.204Z -- pluginops -- feather%20login%20page
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in PluginOps Feather Login Page.This issue affects Feather Login Page: from n/a through 1.1.5.
